name: MeetthePress
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Whether it’s news about politics, election data, our industry-leading polls, Chuck Todd and the NBC News Political Unit runs down the most important stories from Washington every weekday evening to help you make sense of it all. With Meet the Press: The Lid, it’s our mission to help make you a little smarter each day about politics and elections, and we’ll do it in just a few minutes of your evening.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
